content: braided & cabled ear warmer skill level intermediate materials us 7 straight/circular needles 100 yards worsted weight yarn contrasting scrap of yarn cable needle tapestry needle us 7 dpn for 3 needle bind-off pattern co 22 sts using a provisional cast on and the scrap yarn row 1 5 rs k22 sts row 2 4 6 8 ws k5 p12 k5 row 3 k9 cable 8 front k4 and 4 slip the next 4 sts onto a cable needle and hold at front of work k4 from left-hand needle then knit the 4 sts from the cable needle k5 row 7 k5 cable 8 back k4 and 4 slip the next 4 sts onto a cable needle and hold at back of work k4 from left-hand needle then knit the 4 sts from the ccable needle k9 repeat row 1-8 till piece measures 16 keep the 22 sts on the needle and pick up 22 sts from the co edge using the other us 7 needle holding right sides together join both ends using the three needle bind-off or the kitchener stitch for a more seamless look use the tapestry needle to weave in ends collective individual collectiveindiv blogspot com jessika kalwei@gmail com
